TEXT.French: The most primitive Expansion civic
The most primitive Society civic

TEXT.English: Extra experience for air units; extra yield from trade routes with defensive pact partners; trade routes yield production; extra war weariness; cannot use slaves
TEXT.French: Expérience additionnelle pour les unités aériennes ; les routes commerciales avec les civilisations liées par un pacte de défense rapportent davantage ; les routes commerciales rapportent de la production ; lassitude de guerre additionnelle ; impossible d'utiliser des esclaves

TEXT.Spanish: Extra experience for air units; extra yield from trade routes with defensive pact partners; trade routes yield production; extra war weariness; cannot use slaves

TEXT.English: Reduced unhappiness from corporations; extra commerce from excess happiness; extra commerce from Windmills, Nature Preserves and Marine Preserves; can spend gold to finish building production
TEXT.French: Le mécontentement lié aux sociétés commerciales est réduit ; le bonheur en excès rapporte du commerce ; les moulins à vent, les réserves naturelles et les aires marines protégées rapportent du commerce ; vous pouvez dépenser de l'or pour accélérer la construction de bâtiments

TEXT.Spanish: Faster growth for Cottages, Hamlets, Villages; extra commerce from Villages, Towns

TEXT.French: Haven

TEXT.English: Your Immigration is equal to your city's [ICON_HAPPY] minus [ICON_UNHAPPY]. Haven gives a lot of Immigration to small cities and cities with large amounts of excess [ICON_HAPPY]. As cities grow and reach [ICON_HAPPY] neutrality, Immigration greatly slows. Unhappy cities grow even slow, and can shrink.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Recieve [LINK=CONCEPT_IMMIGRATION]Immigration[\LINK] based on [ICON_HAPPY]
Profiteering

TEXT.English: Your Immigration is equal to your city's base [ICON_COMMERCE] (before modifiers) divided by its Population, minus 2 (rounded down). To have positive Immigration, ensure your cities are producing more than 2[ICON_COMMERCE] for every Population. Profiteering works great for cities that produce a lot of [ICON_COMMERCE] relative to their size.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Recieve [LINK=CONCEPT_IMMIGRATION]Immigration[\LINK] based on [ICON_COMMERCE] per Citizen
Multiculturalism

TEXT.English: Your Immigration is equal to your city's base [ICON_CULTURE] (before modifiers) divided by its Population, minus 3 (rounded down). To have positive Immigration, ensure your cities are producing more than 3[ICON_CULTURE] for every Population. Multiculturalism works great for cities that produce a lot of [ICON_CULTURE] relative to their size.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Recieve [LINK=CONCEPT_IMMIGRATION]Immigration[\LINK] based on [ICON_CULTURE] per Citizen
Homesteads
